:. about .:

Hard to Be a God is an action / RPG game based on the 
universe of the book written by Arkadi and Boris Strugatski. 

The story of the game takes place several years after the 
events described in the book. 

Your character will explore the medieval world torn by strife
and civil war, a world whose inhabitants are ready to kill for 
a handful of gold.

The main character is a local, he has just graduated from 
Intelligence Academy. 

He will have to travel across many baronies and counties of 
the great kingdom of Arkanar, take part in the local wars and
fight various monsters. 

He will have to unweave many plots and conspiracies, get in
contact with terrestrials, become a baron, acquire great power 
and reveal the mystery of his home world. happy gaming...
